items.title: Journal article — Renewable and Sustainable Energy Reviews
items.body_html: 10/2025: New journal article: A systematic mapping study on software-based feedback for energy consumption (Renewable and Sustainable Energy Reviews). DOI: 10.1016/j.rser.2025.115889. Co-authors: Zaragoza, Noureddine, Expósito.

items.body_html:

Links: Slides (PDF) · Event page.

items.title: Conference paper — ACM / Crossref
items.body_html: 06/2025: Conference paper: Understanding and Influencing End-User Behavior in Software Energy Consumption. DOI: 10.1145/3756681.3756930. Co-authors: Zaragoza, Soulance, Noureddine, Expósito.

items.title: Dataset release — SMS Corpus & Analysis
items.body_html: 04/2025: Release of the research dataset underlying our systematic mapping study on software-based feedback for energy consumption. The dataset includes the study corpus, screening and classification results, and analysis artefacts used in the SMS. Dataset page.

items.title: Journal article — Energy Research & Social Science
items.body_html: 04/2025: Journal article: A systematic mapping study on software approaches analyzing human behavior in energy efficiency (Energy Research & Social Science). DOI: 10.1016/j.erss.2025.103991. Co-authors: Zaragoza, Noureddine, Expósito.

items.title: Dataset release — User perspectives on Software Energy Consumption
items.body_html:
04/2025: Release of the Understanding and Influencing End-User Behavior in Software Energy Consumption: Campus-wide survey. Includes demographics, NEP attitudes, perception/comprehension/actions scales, ranking tasks, and interview-based qualitative insights.
Links: Dataset page.

items.body_html:
03/2025: PerCom 2024 (Wed 13 Mar, 15:30–17:00) — WIP poster: Studying the Impact of User Feedback on Software Energy Consumption.
Links: Poster (PDF) · Slides (PDF) · Event page.
